name: RansomwareAttack
description: A case template for handling ransomware incidents
author: DFIR-IRIS
summary: Investigation and mitigation of a ransomware attack

tasks.title: Identify infected systems
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the infection by identifying affected systems and users

tasks.title: Contain the infection
tasks.description: Isolate infected systems and disable network shares to prevent further spread

tasks.title: Analyze ransomware
tasks.description: Perform malware analysis to gather information about the ransomware and its behavior. Extract IOCs and loopback on identification

tasks.title: Restore from backups
tasks.description: Restore affected systems and data from secure backups

tasks.title: Update security measures
tasks.description: Implement and update security measures to prevent future attacks

tasks.title: Report to authorities
tasks.description: Report the incident to the relevant authorities

tasks.title: Lesson learned
tasks.description: Document lessons learned and update the incident response plan
